name: Ukraine
declaringWar: Your lands will soon be mine, prepare for war!
attacked: Have you declared war on us? This was a huge mistake on your part, prepare to be destroyed!
defeated: You have destroyed our once great civilization. History will not look kindly upon you.
introduction: Greetings, stranger! I am Ivan Sirko, Vataman of Zaporizhian Cossacks. Gaze in awe on the majesty that is our great civilization!
hateHello: You again! What did you want?
tradeRequest: Well, how is my proposal to you?
